system.description:
Elven Elite

Destiny Playbook

You have become the one thing no elf possible: A better elf. thought was

Requirements

To become the Elven Elite, you must earn the Fellowship of the Elves.

The Elven Elite starts with Perfect Grace.

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.the-elven-elite.Item.NKxn4zQpkr4EoMHD]{Perfect grace}

Advancement

When you Level Up, choose one Advancement from either this list or from your Basic Playbook, then mark it. You may only choose each option once.

  • Take the Elven Core Moves (Elder Arts and Touch The World Lightly). If you already have them, instead increase one of your stats by +1, to a maximum of +3.
  • Take an Elven Custom.
  • Take an Elven Elite Custom.
  • Take an Elven Elite Custom.
  • Take an Elven Elite Custom.

Custom Moves
